actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to provide an annuity for the dependents of persons who perform the service required under chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, and die before granted retired pay.

summary.text: Grants an annuity to dependents of deceased members of the armed forces who performed the service required under the Retired Serviceman's Family Protection Plan which made them eligible for retired pay but who died before the effective date of such Plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to provide an annuity for the dependents of persons who perform the service required under chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, and die before granted retired pay.
